   20: 
   21: %%
   22: -module(openssl_server_cert_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   26: 
   27: %% Common test
   28: -export([all/0,
   29:          groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1,
   31:          init_per_group/2,
   32:          init_per_testcase/2,
   33:          end_per_suite/1,
   34:          end_per_group/2,
   35:          end_per_testcase/2
   36:         ]).
   37: 
   38: 
   39: %% Test cases
   40: -export([no_auth/0,
   41:          no_auth/1,
   42:          auth/0,
   43:          auth/1,
   44:          client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/0,
   45:          client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/1,
   46:          client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/0,
   47:          client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/1,
   48:          client_auth_partial_chain/0,
   49:          client_auth_partial_chain/1,
   50:          client_auth_use_partial_chain/0,
   51:          client_auth_use_partial_chain/1,
   52:          client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain/0,
   53:          client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain/1,
   54:          client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail/0,
   55:          client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail/1,
   56:          missing_root_cert_no_auth/0,
   57:          missing_root_cert_no_auth/1,
   58:          unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth/0,
   59:          unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth/1,
   60:          unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth/0,
   61:          unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth/1,
   62:          hello_retry_request/0,
   63:          hello_retry_request/1,
   64:          custom_groups/0,
   65:          custom_groups/1,
   66:          hello_retry_client_auth/0,
   67:          hello_retry_client_auth/1,
   68:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/0,
   69:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/1,
   70:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/0,
   71:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/1
   72:         ]).
   73: 
   74: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   75: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   76: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   77: all() ->
   78:     [
   79:      {group,  openssl_server}].
   80: 
   81: groups() ->
   82:     [
   83:      {openssl_server, [], protocol_groups()},
   84:      {'tlsv1.3', [], [{group, transport_socket}]},
   85:      {transport_socket, [], tls_1_3_protocol_groups()},
   86:      {'tlsv1.2', [], pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups()},
   87:      {'tlsv1.1', [], pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups()},
   88:      {'tlsv1', [], pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups()},
   89:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups()},
   90:      {'dtlsv1', [], pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups()},
   91:      {rsa, [parallel], all_version_tests()},
   92:      {ecdsa, [parallel], all_version_tests()},
   93:      {dsa, [parallel], all_version_tests()},
   94:      {rsa_1_3, [parallel], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()},
   95:       %% TODO: Create proper conf of openssl server
   96:       %%++ [unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth,
   97:       %% unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth]},
   98:      {rsa_pss_rsae, [parallel], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()},
   99:      {rsa_pss_pss, [parallel], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()},
  100:      {ecdsa_1_3, [parallel], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()}
  101:      %% Enable test later when we have OpenSSL version that
  102:      %% is able to read EDDSA private key files
  103:      %%{eddsa_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()}
  104:     ].
  105: 
  106: protocol_groups() ->
  107:     case ssl_test_lib:openssl_sane_dtls() of
  108:         true ->
  109:             [{group, 'tlsv1.3'},
  110:              {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
  111:              {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
  112:              {group, 'tlsv1'},
  113:              {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
  114:              {group, 'dtlsv1'}];
  115:         false ->
  116:             [{group, 'tlsv1.3'},
  117:              {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
  118:              {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
  119:              {group, 'tlsv1'}
  120:             ]
  121:     end.
  122: 
  123: pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups() ->
  124:     [{group, rsa},
  125:      {group, ecdsa},
  126:      {group, dsa}].
  127: 
  128: tls_1_3_protocol_groups() ->
  129:     [{group, rsa_1_3},
  130:      {group, rsa_pss_rsae},
  131:      {group, rsa_pss_pss},
  132:      {group, ecdsa_1_3}
  133:      %%{group, eddsa_1_3}
  134:     ].
  135: 
  136: tls_1_3_tests() ->
  137:     [
  138:      hello_retry_request,
  139:      custom_groups,
  140:      hello_retry_client_auth,
  141:      hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted,
  142:      hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected
  143:     ].
  144: 
  145: all_version_tests() ->
  146:     [
  147:      no_auth,
  148:      auth,
  149:      missing_root_cert_no_auth
  150:     ].
  151: 
  152: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  153:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_suite(Config, openssl).
  154: 
  155: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  156:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_suite(Config).
  157: 
  158: init_per_group(openssl_server, Config0) ->
  159:     Config = proplists:delete(server_type, proplists:delete(client_type, Config0)),
  160:     [{client_type, erlang}, {server_type, openssl} | Config];
  161: init_per_group(rsa = Group, Config0) ->
  162:     Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0),
  163:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  164:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  165:     %% Make sure _rsa* suite is chosen by ssl_test_lib:start_server
  166:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  167:     Ciphers = ssl_cert_tests:test_ciphers(fun(dhe_rsa) ->
  168:                                                   true;
  169:                                              (ecdhe_rsa) ->
  170:                                                   true;
  171:                                              (_) ->
  172:                                                   false
  173:                                           end, Version),
  174:     case Ciphers of
  175:         [_|_] ->
  176:             [{cert_key_alg, rsa} |
  177:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  178:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> [{ciphers, Ciphers} | COpts] end},
  179:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  180:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  181:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  182:         [] ->
  183:             {skip, {no_sup, Group, Version}}
  184:     end;
  185: init_per_group(rsa_1_3 = Group, Config0) ->
  186:     Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0),
  187:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  188:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  189:     %% Make sure _rsa* suite is chosen by ssl_test_lib:start_server
  190:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  191:     Ciphers = ssl_cert_tests:test_ciphers(undefined, Version),
  192:     case Ciphers of
  193:         [_|_] ->
  194:             [{cert_key_alg, rsa} |
  195:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  196:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> [{ciphers, Ciphers} | COpts] end},
  197:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  198:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  199:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  200:         [] ->
  201:             {skip, {no_sup, Group, Version}}
  202:     end;
  203: init_per_group(Alg, Config) when Alg == rsa_pss_rsae;
  204:                                  Alg == rsa_pss_pss ->
  205:     Supports = crypto:supports(),
  206:     RSAOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(rsa_opts, Supports),
  207: 
  208:     case lists:member(rsa_pkcs1_pss_padding, RSAOpts)
  209:         andalso lists:member(rsa_pss_saltlen, RSAOpts)
  210:         andalso lists:member(rsa_mgf1_md, RSAOpts)
  211:         andalso ssl_test_lib:is_sane_oppenssl_pss(Alg)
  212:     of
  213:         true ->
  214:             #{client_config := COpts,
  215:               server_config := SOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(Alg, [], Config, ""),
  216:             [{cert_key_alg, Alg} |
  217:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  218:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> COpts end},
  219:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  220:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  221:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  222:         false ->
  223:             {skip, "Missing crypto or OpenSSL support"}
  224:     end;
  225: init_per_group(ecdsa = Group, Config0) ->
  226:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  227:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse
  228:                                                 lists:member(dh, PKAlg))
  229:         andalso (ssl_test_lib:openssl_ecdsa_suites() =/= [])
  230:     of
  231:         true ->
  232:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_ecdsa_cert(Config0),
  233:             COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  234:             SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  235:             %% Make sure ecdh* suite is chosen by ssl_test_lib:start_server
  236:             Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  237:             Ciphers =  ssl_cert_tests:test_ciphers(fun(ecdh_ecdsa) ->
  238:                                                            true;
  239:                                                       (ecdhe_ecdsa) ->
  240:                                                            true;
  241:                                                       (_) ->
  242:                                                            false
  243:                                                    end, Version),
  244:             case Ciphers of
  245:                 [_|_] ->
  246:                     [{cert_key_alg, ecdsa} |
  247:                      lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  248:                                   [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> [{ciphers, Ciphers} | COpts] end},
  249:                                    {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  250:                                    lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  251:                                                 lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))]
  252:                                  )];
  253:                         [] ->
  254:                     {skip, {no_sup, Group, Version}}
  255:             end;
  256:         false ->
  257:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  258:     end;
  259: init_per_group(ecdsa_1_3 = Group, Config0) ->
  260:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  261:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse
  262:                                              lists:member(dh, PKAlg))
  263:         andalso (ssl_test_lib:openssl_ecdsa_suites() =/= [])
  264:     of
  265:         true ->
  266:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_ecdsa_cert(Config0),
  267:             COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  268:             SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  269:             %% Make sure ecdh* suite is chosen by ssl_test_lib:start_server
  270:             Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  271:             Ciphers =  ssl_cert_tests:test_ciphers(undefined, Version),
  272:             case Ciphers of
  273:                 [_|_] ->
  274:                     [{cert_key_alg, ecdsa} |
  275:                      lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  276:                                   [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> [{ciphers, Ciphers} | COpts] end},
  277:                                    {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  278:                                    lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  279:                                                 lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))]
  280:                                  )];
  281:                         [] ->
  282:                     {skip, {no_sup, Group, Version}}
  283:             end;
  284:         false ->
  285:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  286:     end;
  287: 
  288: init_per_group(eddsa_1_3, Config0) ->
  289:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  290:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config0),
  291:     case lists:member(eddsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg)) of
  292:         true ->
  293:             Conf = public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
  294:                                                                  intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
  295:                                                                  peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()},
  296:                                                client_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
  297:                                                                  intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
  298:                                                                  peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()}}),
  299:             [{server_config, SOpts},
  300:              {client_config, COpts}] = x509_test:gen_pem_config_files(Conf, filename:join(PrivDir, "client_eddsa"),
  301:                                                                       filename:join(PrivDir, "server_eddsa")),
  302: 
  303:             [{cert_key_alg, eddsa} |
  304:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  305:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> COpts end},
  306:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  307:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  308:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config0))]
  309:                          )];
  310:         false ->
  311:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  312:     end;
  313: init_per_group(dsa = Group, Config0) ->
  314:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  315:     case lists:member(dss, PKAlg) andalso lists:member(dh, PKAlg) andalso
  316:         (ssl_test_lib:openssl_dsa_suites() =/= [])
  317:         andalso (ssl_test_lib:check_sane_openssl_dsa(Config0))
  318:     of
  319:         true ->
  320:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_dsa_cert(Config0),
  321:             COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_dsa_opts, Config),
  322:             SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_dsa_opts, Config),
  323:             %% Make sure dhe_dss* suite is chosen by ssl_test_lib:start_server
  324:             Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  325:             Ciphers =  ssl_cert_tests:test_ciphers(fun(dh_dss) ->
  326:                                                            true;
  327:                                                       (dhe_dss) ->
  328:                                                            true;
  329:                                                       (_) ->
  330:                                                            false
  331:                                                    end, Version),
  332:             case Ciphers of
  333:                 [_|_] ->
  334:                     [{cert_key_alg, dsa} |
  335:                      lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  336:                                   [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> [{ciphers, Ciphers} | COpts]  ++
  337:                                                                    ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(dsa, Version)
  338:                                                       end},
  339:                                    {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  340:                                    lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  341:                                                 lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  342:                 [] ->
  343:                     {skip, {no_sup, Group, Version}}
  344:             end;
  345:         false ->
  346:             {skip, "Missing DSS crypto support"}
  347:     end;
  348: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  349:     case ssl_test_lib:is_protocol_version(GroupName) of
  350:         true  ->
  351:             case ssl_test_lib:check_sane_openssl_version(GroupName, Config) of
  352:                 true ->
  353:                     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group_openssl(GroupName, Config);
  354:                 false  ->
  355:                     {skip, {atom_to_list(GroupName) ++ " not supported by OpenSSL"}}
  356:             end;
  357:         false ->
  358:             ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, Config)
  359:     end.
  360: 
  361: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  362:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  363: 
  364: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  365:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  366:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 30}),
  367:     Config.
  368: 
  369: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  370:     Config.
  371: 
  372: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  373: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  374: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  375: 
  376: no_auth() ->
  377:      ssl_cert_tests:no_auth().
  378: 
  379: no_auth(Config) ->
  380:       ssl_cert_tests:no_auth(Config).
  381: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  382: auth() ->
  383:     ssl_cert_tests:auth().
  384: auth(Config) ->
  385:     ssl_cert_tests:auth(Config).
  386: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  387: client_auth_empty_cert_accepted() ->
  388:      ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_accepted().
  389: client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config) ->
  390:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config).
  391: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  392: client_auth_empty_cert_rejected() ->
  393:       ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_rejected().
  394: client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config) ->
  395:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config).
  396: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  397: client_auth_partial_chain() ->
  398:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_partial_chain().
  399: client_auth_partial_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  400:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_partial_chain(Config).
  401: 
  402: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  403: client_auth_use_partial_chain() ->
  404:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_use_partial_chain().
  405: client_auth_use_partial_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  406:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_use_partial_chain(Config).
  407: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  408: client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain() ->
  409:    ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain().
  410: client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  411:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain(Config).
  412: 
  413: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  414: client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail() ->
  415:    ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail().
  416: client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  417:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail(Config).
  418: 
  419: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  420: missing_root_cert_no_auth() ->
  421:    ssl_cert_tests:missing_root_cert_no_auth().
  422: missing_root_cert_no_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  423:     ssl_cert_tests:missing_root_cert_no_auth(Config).
  424: 
  425: 
  426: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  427: %% TLS 1.3 Test Cases ------------------------------------------------
  428: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  429: hello_retry_request() ->
  430:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_request().
  431: hello_retry_request(Config) ->
  432:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_request(Config).
  433: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  434: custom_groups() ->
  435:     ssl_cert_tests:custom_groups().
  436: custom_groups(Config) ->
  437:     ssl_cert_tests:custom_groups(Config).
  438: unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth() ->
  439:     ssl_cert_tests:unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth().
  440: unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth(Config) ->
  441:     ssl_cert_tests:unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth(Config).
  442: unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth() ->
  443:     ssl_cert_tests:unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth().
  444: unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth(Config) ->
  445:     ssl_cert_tests:unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth(Config).
  446: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  447: hello_retry_client_auth() ->
  448:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth().
  449: hello_retry_client_auth(Config) ->
  450:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth(Config).
  451: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  452: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted() ->
  453:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted().
  454: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config) ->
  455:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config).
  456: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  457: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected() ->
  458:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected().
  459: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config) ->
  460:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config).
